headline: Everest Announces Board Leadership Transition
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, March 24, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, announced that Joseph V. Taranto, current Board Chair, will retire from the role when his term expires in May. Mr. Taranto has served as Chairman of Everest’s Board since 1994 and as Chief Executive Officer from 1994 through 2013.
